title: Get Microsoft Project 2021 Pro or Visio 2021 for just $30 right now
description: Microsoft's project management solutions feature timesheet support, org charts, and more to help you stay organized.

title: I saw Samsung's Ballie robot assistant at CES, and it actually seems helpful
description: This bowling ball-sized robot will be able to double as a projector, smart home hub, and more.

title: CES Day 4: ZDNET's top 10 CES stories you don't want to miss
description: CES is coming to a close, so we've rounded up any product updates or announcements you may have missed this week.

title: Singapore's guidelines to bolster mobile app security are optional - for now
description: The recommended standard offers a common benchmark for app developers on the necessary security controls and best practices to better safeguard users against common malware and phishing attacks.

title: Rabbit sells 10,000 of its R1 AI pocket companions in one day
description: The first batch of Rabbit R1 pre-orders is sold out, but don't fret: The second batch is already available.

title: Buy H&R Block's tax software for just $30 right now
description: H&R Block's Deluxe option can handle your federal and state needs -- and you get get it at a discount now.

title: How to link and sync your iPhone to your Windows 11 PC
description: With Microsoft's Phone Link app, you can make phone calls, send texts, and view notifications right from your computer. Here's how this works.

title: Samsung's S95D OLED is the best TV of CES 2024 and best in the world right now
description: CES 2024 saw transparent TVs, 115-inch TVs, folding TVs, and 8K projectors, but Samsung's latest OLED ruined me on every other TV.

title: The best TVs of CES 2024
description: CES 2024 may be full of AI hype, but brands like TCL, Hisense, and LG unveiled new additions and updates to their home theater lineups with incredible features like transparent OLED panels and all-new, AI-assisted processing chips.

title: This monster 4-port travel adapter can charge all of your tech, at home or on the go
description: Satechi's new 145W GaN travel adapter, unveiled at CES 2024, is compatible with outlets in the US, UK, EU, and Australia.

title: What is GaN? Everything you need to know about gallium nitride-based charging tech
description: You've undoubtedly seen many USB chargers now labeled as including GaN or gallium nitride technology. But what is it, and do you need it?

title: The best CES 2024 tech you can buy right now
description: CES may be known for weird tech that never hits stores, but there are lots of practical phone accessories, laptops, pet tech, and more that you can actually buy today.

title: My favorite MacBook USB-C charger is less than $70 on Amazon right now
description: Get 38% off the Ugreen 140W USB-C charger with this great Amazon deal.

title: Authentication is more complicated than ever. 4 ways to improve cyber defenses for our new reality
description: Bad actors are taking advantage of complex identity infrastructure to sneak in the front door, says Wolfgang Goerlich, advisory CISO for Cisco Duo.

title: This is why AI-powered misinformation is the top global risk
description: Three billion citizens will head to the polls during the next two years. These people must be protected from AI-generated misinformation and disinformation.

title: How to create a playlist on the YouTube app
description: If you're a regular user of the YouTube app, you might be keen to create playlists of your favorite videos, which you can view, shuffle, and even share. Here's how.

title: Google Assistant will lose these 17 features in the next few weeks
description: Most of the actions Google is removing relate to voice commands and were 'underutilized.' If you miss them, here's what you can do.

title: The 12 best mobile accessories at CES 2024 so far: iPhone call recorder, Qi2 chargers, and more
description: These mobile accessories unveiled at CES 2024 from Belkin, HyperJuice, and others are anything but boring and can make your life easier in unexpected ways.

title: Study for a Java certification and pay only $25 this week
description: This Java Programming bundle features seven courses in building modern distributed systems, fundamentals, programming for beginners, and more.

title: The 14 best robots and AI tech we've seen at CES 2024 so far
description: CES 2024 is full of AI-infused products and robots that aim to make your life easier. Here's the full rundown.

title: DJI is showing what a $42,000 drone can do
description: For starters, the new DJI FlyCart 30 can reach speeds of up to 45 mph and carry payloads up to 88lbs.

title: Protect your dog's AirTag with a new collar designed to hold a waterproof case
description: At CES 2024, Catalyst announced the rugged dog collar with a waterproof AirTag case for your furry friend who loves adventure.

title: I demoed Xreal's AR glasses for spatial computing and they're better than I expected
description: Xreal debuted the Air 2 Ultra at CES 2024, featuring six degrees of freedom via dual 3D environment sensors, support for spatial videos, and more.

title: CES 2024 Day 3: The 6 announcements you may have missed
description: Day 3 of CES saw impressive announcements and product reveals from companies like Asus, Sony, Amazon, and more. Here's what you don't want to miss.
